title: GLPI
author: Jeje
postInstallMessage:
⚠️ MANUAL POST-INSTALL REQUIRED (ONE TIME)

GLPI does not initialize its database automatically on Cloudron.

After installing this app, you MUST run the following command once:

cloudron exec bash /app/code/init-glpi.sh

This will initialize the GLPI database and create the default admin account.

Default credentials after initialization:
  Login: glpi
  Password: glpi

⚠️ IMPORTANT:
- Run this script ONLY ONCE
- Change the default password immediately after first login
